Text:
your god is dead...I have one fact that destroys all belief in god...

Starlight takes millions of years to reach the earth...that fact alone destroys any time-line you get from religious books...
It's worth noting that this is a novel and the author is an atheist.
I don't really think that the gods care about these religious books written by some humans ;)

And let it be known, she is a zionist...worse than the nazis...any book written by her should be taken for what it is...garbage...

So how can a nazi jew write about atheism when she support a jewish only state...

quite the contradiction...fucking quacks...

Thanks Mate! - I'm looking for "The New Abs Diet" if you have it.

Thanks again!

wow what is a starlight? wow millions of years? who would know such things? no one lived a million years? I bet that star light is very complex, who could create such things...........HELLLO! look around you, THERE IS GOD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
God is a fiction of our imagination. The end.
